name: Mobile Madness
description:
Do you wanna prove your superiority among your friends quickly? Then this game is for you. It is a shooter game for android where you have to decimate your friends. It is multiplayer, but don't think you need internet for it. It is a local multiplayer game unlike any other. You won't regret downloading it.

Note: Play Protect will flag it because it hasn't seen it yet. You simply have to press the option to download it anyways and when you first open it up it will prompt you to check with Play Protect and you know it has no virus if you don't see anything pop up after that. IF PLAY PROTECT SAYS IT HAS A VIRUS YOU PROBABLY DOWNLOADED AN UNOFFICIAL VERSION THAT WAS MODIFIED AND YOU SHOULD IMMEDIATELY DELETE IT!
